Talk03:
<sp:3:0:2:0c00>What can we do?<sp:5:1:0> The <clr:0000>ladder piece<clr:ffff> is
still here, but what's broke is broke!
Talk10:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:SurpriseS>Huh? <sp:5:0:0>The ladder is fixed? How did you
attach it?

<sp:3:0:2:0c01>But still, it doesn't reach ALL the way
up. So, uh, yeah...
Talk04:
<sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:LaughL_00>Man, you saved me.<sp:5:0:0> I thought I'd
be stuck in that well for the rest of
my life. Seriously.
<sp:3:0:2:0701>I really owe you. So, here. Take this.
Talk05:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:TalkPositive_01>I'm going to catch up to my buddy <clr:0000>Jora<clr:ffff>
and head to <clr:0000>Foothill Stable<clr:ffff>, so we can
apply for the Zonai Survey Team.
Talk11:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:TalkPositive_00>See you around. Thanks again. <sp:5:0:0>And hey,
don't go falling into any wells, OK?
Talk06:
<sp:3:0:2:0b00>What?<sp:5:0:0> You met Jora?<sp:5:0:0> And sitting there in
his underpants, you say...
Talk12: <sp:3:0:2:0b01><snd:SurpriseL_01>Hey! What do you think you're doing?
Talk13: <sp:3:0:2:0000>We need that to get out of here!
Talk08:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Think_00>I even had a <clr:0000>ladder<clr:ffff>! But yeah, it <clr:0000>broke<clr:ffff>
when I tried to climb up.
Talk09:
<sp:3:0:2:0701><snd:Sad_01>Then on top of THAT, my best buddy I go
everywhere with should have noticed.
But, uh, he didn't. He kept right on going.
<sp:3:0:2:0900><snd:Angry_01><sp:0:2:2:7d00>Come on, man! Really?!<sp:0:2:2:6400>


<sp:3:0:2:0701>Sorry, not YOUR fault. Can't tell you how
happy I am that you came down here.

But what now?<sp:5:0:0> The ladder's wrecked.


<sp:3:0:2:0c00><snd:Sad_00>I mean, the <clr:0000>broken part<clr:ffff> is still here, so
we technically could fix it...if the dang
ladder weren't too high to reach.
Talk00:
<sp:3:0:2:0800>Oh my gosh already! <sp:5:1:0>I've waited a long
time for someone to rescue me.

<sp:3:0:2:0701>It's my own darn fault I'm here though.<sp:5:0:0>
Dropped something down the well, and
climbed in after it.
Talk01:
<sp:3:0:2:0c00><snd:Sad>It's just you and me now. Stuck down at
the bottom of a well. Not the worst place
to call home, I guess...<sp:5:1:0>
Talk02:
<sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:Happy_00>Huh? Wait, it's fixed?<sp:5:0:0> Did you do that?


<sp:3:0:2:0701>You're incredible! Now, let's get outta
here already!
